title: I can't connect to any game
body: After champ select it doesn't load me into the game. It just send me to the reconnect screen and will never reconnect. I have uninstalled it, trouble shoot it, and disable firewall and nothing has worked so far. So, now i don't know what to do except just wait n see if it'll be fixed

replies.body:
When did it start, was it after an update? If so, which?

What ISP and network configuration do you have?

Well it was working this afternoon but then i got off for a bit. I got back on around 5 or 6 and then the problem occurred.
ISP - Buckeye broadband 
Network status - operational
